text: Tridrepana septempunctata is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by Warren in 1896. It is found in Assam in India and on Sumatra in Indonesia. The wingspan is about 30.2-34.6 mm. ==Subspecies== *Tridrepana septempunctata septempunctata (India: Assam) *Tridrepana septempunctata nitidior Watson, 1957 (Sumatra) ==References== Category:Moths described in 1896 Category:Drepaninae
title: Tridrepana septempunctata
